Conversations/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Special/: Be careful, hero... A powerful ^dread beast^ haunts this floor...
Conversations/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Floor En: =Gloom=: A mysterious purple haze is =empowering the monsters=.
=HP Penalty=: An ancient magic =siphons some of your life=.
=Exhaustion=: An ancient magic =saps some of your energy=.
=Item Penalty=: Your items have turned to =worthless stone=.
=Damage Down=: Fear grips you =reducing your strength=.
$Fey$: The $blessings of the fey$ empower you.
$HP/ST Boost$: You feel an extraodinarily strong $sense of resolve$.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/rage/desc: Unleash your fury, causing all attacks to do guaranteed critical lethal damage.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/protectio: The priestess protects you, providing a magical barrier that absorbs the next 2 hits.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/serenity/: Meditate, warding off all unnatural afflictions. All floor enchantments are dispelled.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/safety/de: Focus, observing your surroundings. All floor traps are disabled.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/silence/d: You hear nothing but silence. The next dungeon floor will have less monsters.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/fortune/d: Fortune favors the bold. Traverse the ladder to the next dungeon floor.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/redemptio: The priestess blesses you, providing you with a second chance at life.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/alteratio: The future is unpredictable. Some monsters may be altered on the next dungeon floor.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/concealme: Your body becomes ethereal, allowing you to remain undetected by monsters.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/temptatio: Give in, and listen to the faint whispers that call out to you.
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Traps/ex: The hidden floor trap explodes, damaging you and all nearby monsters!
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Traps/lu: The hidden floor rune activates, summoning monsters nearby!
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Traps/fr: The hidden floor rune activates, freezing you in place!
Conversations/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Shrines/: =Dread=: Feelings of =dread= begin to overwhelm you.
=Confusion=: Your perception of reality begins to =distort=.
$Leech$: Your attacks $heal you$ for a portion of the damage dealt.
$Inner Fire$: Channel you inner fire and $breathe flames$ of destruction.
$Grit$: Your unending $courage and resolve$ lead you forward.
Tutorials/Mods/Deep Dungeon/dungeon_curs: All buffs are removed at the start of a floor. Items not specific to the Deep Dungeon are prohibited.
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/c: Your concealment fades! Monsters will now detect you.
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/item_pen: You are unable to use any healing items due to the Item Penalty floor enchantment!
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/item_pro: You may only use healing items specific to the Deep Dungeon!
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/item_res: You may only use Deep Dungeon specific items inside the dungeon!
